name: Space Lagat (itch)
description:
Remake of a video game for the Agat (soviet 8-bit computer, clone of the Apple II)

The goal of the game is to evade the snake and to gain points by collecting crystals. Keep in mind that different crystals worth different amount of points. Every 200 points you move to a next level, every 1k points you get an extra life.  There is a total of 30 levels, all different.

Controls:
arrows/WASD - movement
space - placing a block

gamepads !

Pro tip: start turning before you actually reach intersection
